CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 12, 1958, pg. A10 reads: "Enjoy Smorgasbord - A small section of the large crowd of smorgasbord patrons was caught by The Courier photographer as the sampled delicacies which were spread in undercroft of the Church of the Holy Cross, Saturday. This second annual food-fare, sponsored by the Holy Cross Men's Guild, offered a variety of famous American and foreign palatables.  Frederick D. Lee was chairman of the successful promotion - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of men, and women, including one wearing dark fur coat and dark hat with checkered band, filling plates of food from buffet table during second annual food-fare, Church of Holy Cross
